Class Object
In: lib/mocha/object.rb
Parent: Object

Methods added all Objects.

Methods

expects   stubs  

Public Instance methods

expects(symbol) → expectation

Adds an expectation that a method identified by symbol must be called exactly once with any parameters. Returns the new expectation which can be further modified by methods on Mocha::Expectation. 

  product = Product.new
  product.expects(:save).returns(true)
  assert_equal false, product.save

[Source]

    # File lib/mocha/object.rb, line 32
32:   def expects(symbol) 
33:     method = stubba_method.new(stubba_object, symbol)
34:     $stubba.stub(method)
35:     mocha.expects(symbol, caller)
36:   end
stubs(symbol) → expectation

Adds an expectation that a method identified by symbol may be called any number of times with any parameters. Returns the new expectation which can be further modified by methods on Mocha::Expectation. 

  product = Product.new
  product.stubs(:save).returns(true)
  assert_equal false, product.save

[Source]

    # File lib/mocha/object.rb, line 45
45:   def stubs(symbol) 
46:     method = stubba_method.new(stubba_object, symbol)
47:     $stubba.stub(method)
48:     mocha.stubs(symbol, caller)
49:   end

[Validate]
